attributes.action: tighten classification controls so that games such as BULLY are not available to children under 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The game 'bully' has been licensed for 15 year olds. This offensive content is therefore available to pupils from year 10 and will get into the hands of younger pupils. The content of this title encourages and glorifies behavior which damages thousands of people each year. With the version for the wii, teenagers will be able to act out acts of bullying and violence in their front rooms, before heading off to school.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
